introduction: I am writing to express my interest in the Senior Fullstack Node.js Engineer (React) position at Sainsbury’s Tech. With four years of experience building scalable, high-performance applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my skills to Sainsbury’s innovative engineering team.

projects.title: Cloud IDE
projects.description: Built an online cloud IDE platform using React, TypeScript, and Node.js, integrating intelligent plugins for real-time code completion and debugging while deploying the system on AWS for scalability, streamlining CI/CD pipelines.

projects.title: 3D NFT Platform
projects.description: Designed and deployed a platform with React and Golang, serving over 1,000 clients with a 96% satisfaction rate.

projects.title: AI chatbot
projects.description: Deployed a Q&A chatbot leveraging the ChatGPT API, using Node.js and Vue.js, implementing streaming output and seamless API integration, which has since become an essential productivity tool for the company.

skills: I am particularly drawn to Sainsbury’s focus on customer-centric solutions and its commitment to leveraging cutting-edge technologies like AI and cloud infrastructure. The opportunity to work on a high-impact team driving Sainsbury’s loyalty and rewards programs resonates deeply with my professional aspirations. My hands-on experience with agile methodologies, including Scrum and pair programming, aligns with your collaborative and iterative approach to product development.
missionStatement: I am eager to bring my technical skills, problem-solving mindset, and passion for innovation to Sainsbury’s Tech. I am confident that my experience aligns well with your needs, and I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team’s success.
closing: Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.

workExperience.title: Front-End Developer
description: Greenfield Development: Designed and implemented a 3D NFT platform from scratch using React and Golang, serving over 1,000 clients with a 96% satisfaction rate.
Legacy System Modernization: Migrated a legacy system to a Vue 3-based architecture, improving load times by 30% and enhancing stability.

AI Integration: Developed an intelligent Q&A chatbot leveraging the ChatGPT API, implemented real-time streaming to enhance user interactions, and scaled the system to support multiple departments, increasing overall productivity.

Leadership: Promoted from Junior to Mid-Level Developer within one year; mentored two junior developers, standardized coding practices, and introduced a Vue template scaffolding tool, reducing project setup time by 50%.

AWS Experience: Deployed containerized applications using AWS Lambda and ECS and managed image repositories with AWS ECR, ensuring efficient deployment pipelines. Used AWS S3 for basic storage needs, such as handling static assets.
